name: discord-hono
description: Edge Functions module for interacting with the Discord API
author: Luis (https://github.com/LuisFun)

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run tag
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run tag
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run tag
scripts.tag: git tag -a v$npm_package_version -m 'v$npm_package_version' && git push origin v$npm_package_version
